struct.exostring: injection animation on both outcasts, and a glowing effect
animation of handing something to the speaker??

Dialog Mission Statement:
If player initiates dialog infected outcasts beg for player to help them. Player can refuse to help or player can get the Rakghoul serum and cure them. If cured they will give player info about the downed escape pod.
Exit Points: 1. Player has cured the infected ones and they have already returned to village, player reinitiates dialog. Thank player, don't perform any other actions. 2. Player gives cure to outcasts. They play animation of taking the cure, they give player info about downed escape pod, thank player then return to the village. The plot is marked as done. 3 and 4. Generic goodbyes. Player has not saved infected ones. No action needed.
animation of handing something to the speaker??
